name: Story of My Life
description:
This game illustrates a simple life with all its highs and lows.

On the journey of life you are facing certain hardships (obstacles / traps) where you have to let go of parts of your lifespan to continue.

People will try to stop you and sometimes you fall into a deep pit where it takes some time to recover, maybe longer than you expect.

Like time passes by, it’s impossible to go back.
